comments.body: Since these cache settings never worked, should I just remove this and the ANSIBLE_INVENTORY_PLUGIN_SCRIPT_CACHE env var (and just use the inventory_cache fragment)?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@            are responsible for their own caching. This option will be removed in 2.12.
        ini:
           - section: inventory_plugin_script
             key: cache
        env:
